description: Number of prime factors of 4^n + 1 (counted with multiplicity).
links: S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., The Cunningham Project
S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., Main Tables from the Cunningham Project.
maple: with(numtheory); A057940:=n->bigomega(4^n + 1); seq(A057940(n), n=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 28 2014
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Oct 15 2000.
